## SenderResource.getDefaultSignature() method

Retrieves the image that is being used by a recipient as their default signature when signing a transaction.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getDefaultSignature(senderId: string): Promise<Responses.SignatureImage>;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  senderId | string | Unique sender ID |

<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;Responses.SignatureImage&gt;

A payload that contains data of the signature image.
